body.name: Rose Hydrating Facial Cleanser – Gentle Foaming Face Wash Gel for Dry, Sensitive, & Oily Skin Made with Real Rose Petals & Korean Skincare Technology, 4.73 Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 11 hrs 57 mins
features: Foaming Vitamin-Infused Cleanser – This lightweight & gentle foaming cleanser is a Korean skincare essential enriched with vitamins to effectively remove dirt, oil, & makeup, leaving oily & dry skin hydrated

Rose Petal Infused Foaming Cleanser – Our gentle face wash features real provence rose petals combined with a foaming formula that lifts dead skin cells & sebum without stripping moisture & is ideal for hydrating & cleansing oily skin

Daily Face Wash for Men & Women – Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, our hydrating face wash is a gentle foaming cleanser that effectively cleanses without causing irritation or dryness

Convenient Hydrating Facial Cleanser – Our gentle face wash is a hydrating foaming cleanser that comes in a squeezable bottle for easy use. Simply lather with water, massage onto your face, & rinse for a refreshed complexion. Follow with your preferred toner, moisturizer, & eye cream for best results
Clean & Clear Face Wash – Eco-friendly & free of harmful ingredients! Free of parabens, alcohols, silicones, & made in Korea

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE this facial wash!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using La Florelle for a few weeks now and I love it! Upon application, it’s very cooling and calming and creates a gentle lather. Face feels so clean, refreshed, and moisturized. It smells AMAZING too with a subtle scent of roses. Luxury product but with an unbeatable price! I’ve purchased more to let my mom, sister and aunts try! It’s THAT great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I decided to try something new and it’s wonderful. This La Florelle face wash not only has a lovely light rose sent but also has little pieces of rose petals in it. My skin feels so soft and smells beautiful. I have sensitive skin and no irritation from La Florelle, you should try it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the texture and smell!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have sensitive skin, this worked great! Left my skin smooth and hydrated. You get a good amount of product for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Rose scented gel cleanser; relatively gentle
reviews.reviewText: This says it is a foam cleanser but it is more like a gel. It does have quite a bit of a rose scent but I don't mind it! It has a nice texture and doesn't dry out the skin! There are little pieces in it to help with a light exfoliation. I like that it seems gentle and cleans my face well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way!
reviews.reviewText: Use about half-a-penny sized dot and you should be okay! Maybe I’m just minimal with my usage but it lasts so long this way! Love the scent so much. Makes me feel all pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would definitely recommend
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. It makes my skin look and feel great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells like roses and takes makeup off
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a new makeup removing face wash and tried a few others first which left my face oily. This one is not oil-based. It left my face feeling clean and easily took off all of my makeup. It also smells like actual roses, unlike a lot of others out there. Very happy with it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It clears my face well but I am not a fan of the scent.
